entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
